messages.name: Steve
messages.message: Happy Birthday my darling favourite person. I wrote you a poem for ur eyes only, available upon request within three business days.

messages.name: Will
messages.message: Here‚Äôs to the person who organized the house that completely changed my life. Here‚Äôs to the person who lights up a room with her intellect and her giggles. She‚Äôs more than barley, not merely merrily, the most marvelous Marley, she‚Äôs earned a happy birthday!

messages.name: Simon
messages.message: Happy birthday Marley! Looking forward to more impromptu adventures

messages.name: Miasya
messages.message:
Happy Birthday Marley!

You‚Äôre one of the most influential people I‚Äôve ever met. You encourage me to take risks and be radically curious. I‚Äôm so happy that we became friends at McGill.

I hope you have an amazing year filled with excitement and wonder!

messages.name: Dmitri
messages.message:
a birthday poem



It's the birthday of Marley
So we must create a rhyme
It may be a little gnarly
But that's how it be, sometimes

Such a curius person
Will she figure out the brain?
A fast and furious person
There's no stopping this hype train

Putting her mind at work
To find these neural links
She's gonna solve it in a blink
Btw is the brain even pink?

So much work and so many projects
Must be quite a thrill
She must be underwater
But she never drowns
Must have gone to Mc Gill


Link to PDF of this poem with proper font

messages.name: Cheng
messages.message: Happy Birthday Marley! You are an awesome, inspiring, and amazingly curious person. I'm so glad to have met you 3 years ago and I hope you have a great day!

Marley! Happy birthday! I hope you‚Äôre doing good :) and I hope we have more meals together like miso lanzoma onion soup. Happy birthday, I hope you have a good one, and good food and good people :)

This is the transcript of a voice message, available upon request

messages.name: Mom
messages.message:
To my daughter Marley,

Happy Birthday!

Never forget that I love you more than you will ever know. Believe in yourself as much as I believe in you. May all your dreams come true.

messages.name: Michelle_W
messages.message: Happy birthday Marley! I hope you‚Äôre doing well. Have a great day and keep making cool things!

messages.name: Zach
messages.message:
Good morning Marley,

There are three Marley's in this world: the people of Marley, Bob Marley (and his speakers), and Marley Xiong. Only one of them is an IMO silver medalist who went to McGill University, loves to travel for reasons outside of wanting to destroy the walls of Eldia, and is always high on a mysterious substance... oh wait, that's Bob, or is it??? Je vous souhaite a happy 2022-2016+18=24th birthday! By the way, I know you don't drink Tim Horton's coffee, but their Roll-up-the-rim (TM) is back, and I have a theory that you might find interesting. Since last year, their roll up the rim has been moved online. So instead of rolling up physical rims, you do the "roll up" on their app, which is basically a dice roll. My theory is that if you do the "roll" late at night (say 3am) when no one else is rolling, your odds of winning free coffees drastically shoots up. I've tested this on 20 rolls and I've gotten 10 coffees. I don't know statistics, so I don't know how to test this. Anyway, happy birthday! Hi Steve.

Best wishes,
Zach

messages.name: Felipe
messages.message: Happy birthday Marley!! I hope you have a wonderful day!

messages.name: Noah
messages.message: Dear Marley, happy birthday! Your kindness and adventurous spirit brightens my life. You teach me to be more brave. I hope we can play basketball sometime soon, there is a lot to learn from this sport.
